page.title: 17Transport.
page.content: Our block might well be termed isolated because of the lack of busy roads. Only one major road runs through it - the A588. Buses are few and far between, (there are none at all on Sundays) and the single-track railway line between Glasson Dock and Lancaster closed to passenger traffic in the early 1930's, so that people rely heavily on the motor car for mobility. Most families in our school own a car, but those who do not are very restricted in getting out and about. The canal could be used for transportation, but progress would be very slow and restricted.
